publicwhip.spmotion: *S1M-3269 Irene Oldfather: Bus Accident in France - Motion of Condolenceâ€”That the Parliament notes the tragic bus accident near Dijon, France, in the early morning of 27 June 2002 involving pupils and staff from Largs Academy, North Ayrshire; sends its condolences to the bereaved and its best wishes to the families and friends of the injured, and urges the Scottish Executive to do all it can to assist the families at this difficult and distressing time.

S1M-3269 Bus Accident in France - Motion of Condolence (lodged on 27 June 2002) Stewart Stevenson*, Margaret Jamieson*, Mr Murray Tosh*, Phil Gallie*, Mr Gil Paterson*, Robert Brown*, Colin Campbell*, Rhona Brankin*, Kay Ullrich*, Cathie Craigie*, Sarah Boyack*, Scott Barrie*, Kate Maclean*, Jackie Baillie*, Christine Grahame*, Rhoda Grant*, Johann Lamont*, Mr Kenny MacAskill*, Elaine Smith*, Nora Radcliffe*, Mr Michael McMahon*, Richard Lochhead*, Robin Harper*, Helen Eadie*, Shona Robison*, Fiona McLeod*, Mary Scanlon*, Mr John McAllion*, Karen Gillon*, Michael Matheson*, Mrs Lyndsay McIntosh*, Angus MacKay*, Dr Sylvia Jackson*, Miss Annabel Goldie*, Mr Kenneth Macintosh*

S1M-3269 Bus Accident in France - Motion of Condolence (lodged on 27 June 2002) Mr Brian Monteith*, John Scott*, Mr Keith Raffan*, Mr Kenneth Gibson*, Brian Adam*, Iain Smith*, Ian Jenkins*, Paul Martin*, David Mundell*
S1M-3269 Bus Accident in France - Motion of Condolence (lodged on 27 June 2002) Ms Sandra White*, Brian Fitzpatrick*
S1M-3269 Bus Accident in France - Motion of Condolence (lodged on 27 June 2002) Alex Neil*
S1M-3269 Bus Accident in France - Motion of Condolence (lodged on 27 June 2002) Susan Deacon*
S1M-3269 Bus Accident in France - Motion of Condolence (lodged on 27 June 2002) Donald Gorrie*
S1M-3269 Bus Accident in France - Motion of Condolence (lodged on 27 June 2002) Marilyn Livingstone*
